ISSUE.TITLE: GDPR setup cannot change number of consents Items displayed in "items per page" - it goes blank
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.1 Found locally but verified on your demo site. in the GDPR settings click on the number of "items per page" where the 10 is. It goes blank. If you have more than 10 consents there you can move from page 1 to any other page by clicking on the page number but you cannot change the number of items that display on the page. I apologize if this is already known to exist I was unable to find another issue about it.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #3450 Fixed "Continue shopping" button issue with the search page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3443 Properly prepare page parameters of GDPR consents
